about_the_game:
In 20XX, android AI now has the capacity to serve humanity by replacing dangerous, servantile, and repetitive jobs. With that power, comes responsibility.

Recently group of hackers known as the Red Bombers have taken over personal androids enjoyed by the population. It's up to Alphaman to burst into action and take them down!

This OST features all 13 tracks from Alphaman in their original lossless .WAV format:

Track listing:
  • 1) ...and the Story Begins (2:01)
  • 2) Stage Select (0:36)
  • 3) Stage Intro (0:06)
  • 4) Chefbot Stage (2:01)
  • 5) Firebot Stage (2:25)
  • 6) Maidbot Stage (2:01)
  • 7) Usherbot Stage (1:49)
  • 8) The Big Bad (Boss Theme) (1:25)
  • 9) Weapon Get (0:06)
  • 10) Enter the Fortress (0:07)
  • 11) Bomber Stages (2:37)
  • 12) The Bigger Bad (2:45)
  • 13) The Journey's End (2:42)
Total Time: (20:47)
detailed_description:
In 20XX, android AI now has the capacity to serve humanity by replacing dangerous, servantile, and repetitive jobs. With that power, comes responsibility.

Recently group of hackers known as the Red Bombers have taken over personal androids enjoyed by the population. It's up to Alphaman to burst into action and take them down!

This OST features all 13 tracks from Alphaman in their original lossless .WAV format:
